Headline: Update: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Update: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
